com.risk.model.strategies

Class Aggressive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.strategies.Aggressive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    public class Aggressive
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable
    An aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).
    Since:
    19-November-2018
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    binay
